name: Me and my hearth
description: A short and unexpected adventure of you and your heart on the run from the hospital. You are stuck in the hospital with your heart removed, try the bobsleigh from the evil robotic doctors. There is also an endless mode in the campaign.It is recommended to play the game on a mobile phone or with a joystick that is activated by pressing ESC in the game and switching the mode to the joystick.I hope you have a good time.
